channel.title: Dockerfile :: CIS 526 Textbook
channel.description: YouTube Video Dockerfile We are now ready to create a Dockerfile that will build our application into a single Docker container that can be easily deployed in a variety of different infrastructures. Because our application is really two parts (the server and the client), we can use a Multi-Stage Build in Docker to make a very streamlined version of our image. Docker Init In this tutorial, weâ€™ll go through building this Dockerfile manually.
